TopicTitle: What is the .php file and how does it relate to the .craft file?

Articles.Content: The ships I have downloaded so far are mostly these .php files. What exactly are they? I know you need a .craft file to let the game use it. Is there a way to convert it or something?
You need to update firefox or use a different browser-this is a problem with a previous version of firefox not working with our forum software properly.

Specifically Firefox 8 had a little spat with spec compliance nerds. 7 and 9 are both fine.

You can rename any .php files you\'ve downloaded to the proper extension and they\'ll be OK, it\'s just the filename that gets screwed up.
just ignore the php open it directly with win rar to get your files:P
